Class Activity

java.lang.Object
Activity
Direct Known Subclasses:
PoweredActivity
public class Activity extends Object

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected String
    activityName
    The name of the activity (e.g., "Running").
    protected static List<Activity>
    allActivities
    Global list of all activities (for listing, stats, etc).
    protected List<Athlete>
    athletes
    List of athletes who performed this activity.
    protected int
    caloriesLost
    The total calories lost for this activity (calculated).

    caloriesPerDistance
    Calories burned per unit distance (e.g., per km).
    protected String
    customMode
    The custom transport mode for this activity (null if using enum).
    protected static Set<String>
    customModes
    Set of all custom (user-defined) transport modes.
    protected int
    distance
    The distance of the activity (e.g., in km).
    protected TransportMode
    mode
    The transport mode for this activity (enum, or null if custom).

  • Method Details

    • getCaloriesPerDistance

      public int getCaloriesPerDistance()
      Calculates and returns the total calories lost for this activity.
      Returns:
      total calories lost (caloriesPerDistance * distance)

    • setAthlete

      public void setAthlete(Athlete athlete)
      Associates an athlete with this activity.
      Parameters:
      athlete - the athlete to add

    • listActivities

      public static void listActivities()
      Lists the names of all activities.

    • listActivitiesByTransportMode

      public static void listActivitiesByTransportMode()
      Lists all activities grouped by transport mode (enum and custom). Shows if an activity is powered in parentheses.

    • listActivitiesDetails

      public static void listActivitiesDetails()
      Shows detailed information for all activities, grouped by mode. Includes distance, calories, athlete count, and powered/equipment info.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this activity, including mode, distance, and calories.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object

      Returns:

    • calculateTotalCaloriesAll

      public static int calculateTotalCaloriesAll()
      Calculates the total calories burned across all activities.
      Returns:
      total calories burned

    • listActivitiesByAthlete

      public static void listActivitiesByAthlete(Athlete athlete)
      Lists all activities performed by a given athlete, showing units, total calories, and distance. Indicates if an activity is powered and the equipment used.
      Parameters:
      athlete - the athlete to check

    • calculateDistanceByAthlete
